And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>: <S%H6019>Amram<s%>, <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>, and <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%>: <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>: <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>, and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>.
Eleazar <S%H499><s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>, <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H50>Abishua<s%>,
and <S%H50>Abishua<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1231>Bukki<s%>, and <S%H1231>Bukki<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%>,

and <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>, (he it is that executed the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office in the <S%H1004>house<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>),
and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%>, and <S%H568>Amariah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H285>Ahitub<s%>,
and <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>,
and <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>, and <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>,
and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%>, and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%>;

And <S%H3087>Jehozadak<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> into <S%H3068>captivity<s%>, when Jehovah carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>: <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>, <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, and <S%H4847>Merari<s%>.
And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>: <S%H3845>Libni<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were <S%H6019>Amram<s%>, and <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>, and <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>: <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi<s%>. And these are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses.
Of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>: <S%H3845>Libni<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2155>Zimmah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Joah <S%H3098><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2979>Jeatherai<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>: <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H7141>Korah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H617>Assir<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Elkanah <S%H511><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H43>Ebiasaph<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H617>Assir<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>: <S%H6022>Amasai<s%>, and <S%H287>Ahimoth<s%>.
As for <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>: <S%H6689>Zophai<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5184>Nahath<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Eliab <S%H446><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3395>Jeroham<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>: the <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, <S%H2059>Joel<s%>, and the second <S%H29>Abijah<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>: <S%H4249>Mahli<s%>, <S%H3845>Libni<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5798>Uzzah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Shimea <S%H8092><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2293>Haggiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And these are they whom <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> over the <S%H3027>service<s%> of <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, after that the <S%H727>ark<s%> had <S%H4494>rest<s%>.

And they <S%H8334>ministered<s%> with <S%H7892>song<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, until <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and they <S%H5975>waited<s%> on their <S%H5656>office<s%> according to their <S%H4941>order<s%>.

And these are they that <S%H5975>waited<s%>, and their <S%H1121>sons<s%>. Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>: <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H7891>singer<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>,

the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8480>Tahath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H617>Assir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, who <S%H5975>stood<s%> on his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, even <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8092>Shimea<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1202>Baaseiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H867>Ethni<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H387>Ethan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2155>Zimmah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3189>Jahath<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

And on the left <S%H8040>hand<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>: <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7029>Kishi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5660>Abdi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4409>Malluch<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H557>Amzi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer<s%>,
the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.
And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H5414>appointed<s%> for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

But <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6999>offered<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%>, for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3722>place<s%>, and to make atonement for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according to all that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>: <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H50>Abishua<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Bukki <S%H1231><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2228>Zerahiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Meraioth <S%H4812><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H568>Amariah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H285>Ahitub<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>,
Zadok <S%H6659><s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

Now these are their <S%H4186>dwelling-places<s%> according to their <S%H2918>encampments<s%> in their <S%H1366>borders<s%>: to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> (for theirs was the first <S%H1486>lot<s%>),
to them they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof round about <S%H5439>it<s%>;
but the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H2691>villages<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, they gave to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>.

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; <S%H3841>Libnah<s%> also with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H3492>Jattir<s%>, and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H2432>Hilen<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1688>Debir<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H6228>Ashan<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;

and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H1387>Geba<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H5964>Allemeth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>. All their <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And unto the rest of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> were given by <S%H1486>lot<s%>, <S%H3498>out<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%>, out of the <S%H2677>half-tribe<s%>, <S%H4294><s%> the <S%H4276>half<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>, according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

Unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> were given by <S%H1486>lot<s%>, according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>, out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, these <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H7121>mentioned<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>.
And some of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> had <S%H5892>cities<s%> of their <S%H1366>borders<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto them the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>; <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> also with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H3361>Jokmeam<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1032>Beth-horon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H357>Aijalon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1667>Gath-rimmon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;

and out of the half-tribe4276, 4294 of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H6063>Aner<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H1109>Bileam<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>.

Unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%> were <S%H4940>given<s%>, out of the family of the half-tribe2677, 4294 of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;
and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H1705>Daberath<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H6046>Anem<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;
and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H4913>Mashal<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H5658>Abdon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H2712>Hukok<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7340>Rehob<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;

and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H2540>Hammon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.

Unto the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>Levites<s%>, the sons of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, were <S%H4294>given<s%>, out of the tribe of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H7417>Rimmono<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;

and <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, on the east <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, were given <S%H4294>them<s%>, out of the tribe of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H3096>Jahzah<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H6932>Kedemoth<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H4158>Mephaath<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>;
and out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>,
and <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>, and <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> with its <S%H4054>suburbs<s%>.
